trans-unit.source: In Project Explorer in Android Studio, open the ToDoActivity.java file and add the following import statements.

trans-unit.source: This creates a new method to handle the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: This creates a new method to handle the authentication process.

trans-unit.source: The user is authenticated by using a Google login.
trans-unit.target: The user is authenticated by using a Google login.

trans-unit.source: A dialog is displayed which displays the ID of the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: A dialog is displayed which displays the ID of the authenticated user.

trans-unit.source: You cannot proceed without a positive authentication.
trans-unit.target: You cannot proceed without a positive authentication.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an identity provider other than Google, change the value passed to the login method above to one of the following: MicrosoftAccount, Facebook, Twitter, or windowsazureactivedirectory.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an identity provider other than Google, change the value passed to the login method above to one of the following: MicrosoftAccount, Facebook, Twitter, or windowsazureactivedirectory.

trans-unit.source: In the onCreate method, add the following line of code after the code that instantiates the MobileServiceClient object.
trans-unit.target: In the onCreate method, add the following line of code after the code that instantiates the MobileServiceClient object.

trans-unit.source: This call starts the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: This call starts the authentication process.

trans-unit.source: Move the remaining code after authenticate(); in the onCreate method to a new createTable method, which looks like this:
trans-unit.target: Move the remaining code after authenticate(); in the onCreate method to a new createTable method, which looks like this:

trans-unit.source: From the Run menu, then click Run app to start the app and sign in with your chosen identity provider.
trans-unit.target: From the Run menu, then click Run app to start the app and sign in with your chosen identity provider.

trans-unit.source: When you are successfully logged-in, the app should run without errors, and you should be able to query Mobile Services and make updates to data.
trans-unit.target: When you are successfully logged-in, the app should run without errors, and you should be able to query Mobile Services and make updates to data.
